block.p: Terri Lev Koller and Robert N. Kaplan are to be married today by Rabbi Norton D. Shargel at their home in Rye, N.Y.

The bride worked until 1997 as a clinical social worker in the outpatient drug and alcohol recovery program at Greenwich Hospital in Greenwich, Conn. She graduated from Ohio State University and received her master's degree in social work from Fordham. She also has an advanced certificate in clinical social work from New York University. She is the daughter of Simone Lev of Aventura, Fla., and the late Leon Lev.

The bridegroom is the senior partner in Kaplan, Kilsheimer & Fox, a New York law firm. He graduated from Williams College and Columbia Law School. He is a son of the late Hazel and Leo Kaplan.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce; the bridegroom was a widower.
